name: PLIS
description: Platform for Life Improvement and Support

scripts.preinstall: npm i -g license-checker npm-check-updates & pushd . & cd src & npm i & popd
scripts.win: chcp 65001 && npm run license-check && electron-forge start
scripts.build-appx: npx electron-builder -w --x64 && electron-windows-store --input-directory ./dist/win-unpacked --output-directory ./dist/appx --package-name PLIS --package-display-name PLIS --package-version 1.1.0.0 --publisher-display-name SUGIMURA Hiroshi (Kanagawa Institute of Technology) --identity-name 9NQ6XZG0KPL3.Dept.ofHomeElectronicsKAI.PLIS
scripts.store: npx electron-windows-store --input-directory ./out/PLIS-win32-x64 --output-directory ./out/appx --package-version 1.1.0.0 --package-name PLIS --identity-name Dept.ofHomeElectronicsKAI.PLIS --windows-kit "C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\bin\10.0.19041.0\x64"
